question_details.title: Will a pilot report of UFOs come from a country in Africa in March 2025?
question_details.description: For example, the resolution source [reports](https://nuforc.org/sighting/?id=186297) a 4 craft inline formation of UFOs having been sighted on January 1, 2025 in Rwanda.
question_details.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if The National UFO Reporting Center posts a pilot report of a UFO/UAP having occurred in a country on the African continent, during the month of March 2025 at [this link](https://nuforc.org/subndx/?id=x) when accessed by Metaculus on or after April 1, 2025.

news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**Fórum de Investimento da África Lusófona 2025: Promoting Investment Opportunities in PALOP**
The 'Fórum de Investimento da África Lusófona 2025' will take place on March 13-14 in Cabo Verde, aiming to promote investment opportunities in the Portuguese-speaking African countries (PALOP). The event, organized by the International Finance Corporation (IFC), will bring together private sector representatives, national and international institutions, and government officials to explore concrete investment opportunities and address challenges in these markets. According to the organizers, the forum will discuss 'desafios e oportunidades nos mercados lusófonos' (challenges and opportunities in the lusophone markets), strategies for attracting Foreign Direct Investment (IDE), and inspiring investment cases. 'Desafios e oportunidades nos mercados lusófonos, estratégias para captar Investimento Direto Estrangeiro (IDE), casos inspiradores de investimentos e tendências atuais e perspetivas futuras em diferentes setores de atividade estarão em cima da mesa.' (Challenges and opportunities in the lusophone markets, strategies for capturing Foreign Direct Investment (IDE), inspiring investment cases, and current trends and future perspectives in different sectors of activity will be on the table.)
Original language: pt
Publish date: March 06, 2025 06:31 PM
Source:[Sapo - Portugal Online!](https://jornaleconomico.sapo.pt/noticias/evento-vai-destacar-oportunidades-para-investir-na-africa-lusofona/)

**EXCLUSIVE: Dr Steven Greer on 2nd Congressional UFO Meeting, Aliens Blowing Up Villages in Africa**
Dr. Steven Greer discussed the second Congressional UFO meeting and expressed concerns over the narratives surrounding UFOs and aliens. He criticized the ufology media environment, calling it a 'snake pit', and warned against spreading unverified stories. Dr. Greer, a seasoned scientist, has consistently called out disinformation attempts, aiming to prevent a mix of truth and falsehoods from misleading the public and influencing government proceedings. He warns that such narratives could be manipulated to serve broader agendas, like fostering a global 'alien threat' perception. Dr. Greer also highlighted concerns over David Grush's claims about aliens attacking villages in Africa and South America, which he believes are exaggerated and potentially misleading.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 06, 2025 06:21 PM
Source:[VladTV - Breaking Urban News](https://www.vladtv.com/article/309839/dr-steven-greer-on-2nd-congressional-ufo-meeting-aliens-blowing-up)

**Eclipses in March 2025: Total Lunar and Partial Solar**
There will be two eclipses in March 2025: a total lunar eclipse and a partial solar eclipse. The total lunar eclipse will occur on March 13th and will be visible in most of the Western Hemisphere. It will start at 21:57 hours (Central Mexican Time) and will be visible as a 'blood moon' in many parts of the world, including Asia, Australia, Africa, North America, South America, and the Pacific, Atlantic, Arctic, and Antarctic Oceans. The eclipse will end at 4:00 hours on March 14th. A partial solar eclipse will occur on March 29th, but will only be visible in a few regions of the Northern Hemisphere, such as Europe, Northern Asia, North and West Africa, and Northwest Canada. According to experts, a lunar eclipse occurs when the Moon enters the Earth's shadow, which can shorten or block some of the sunlight reflected by the Moon. A solar eclipse occurs when the Moon blocks the sunlight from reaching the Earth, while a partial solar eclipse occurs when the Sun, Moon, and Earth are not perfectly aligned, causing a small part of the Sun's surface to appear dark. These events are relatively rare and can be observed from the night side of the Earth.
Original language: es
Publish date: March 05, 2025 07:57 PM
Source:[ViveUSA.mx](https://www.viveusa.mx/destinos/estos-son-los-eclipses-que-habra-en-marzo-de-2025-cuando-donde-y-como-verlos/)

**Two Astronomical Events in March 2025: A Total Lunar Eclipse and a Partial Solar Eclipse**
In March 2025, there will be two astronomical events: a total lunar eclipse on March 21 and a partial solar eclipse on March 29. The partial solar eclipse will be visible in areas such as Europe, North Africa, and North Russia, but not in Argentina. According to astronomer, 'the eclipse will start at 8:50 local time and reach its maximum at 10:47, ending at 12:43.' It is essential to take precautions when observing the solar eclipse, as looking directly at the Sun can cause permanent eye damage. 'Los eclipses are unique opportunities to observe natural phenomena that do not occur frequently,' and they provide a chance for people worldwide to connect with the universe and science. With proper precautions, both events can be enjoyed safely.
Original language: es
Publish date: March 05, 2025 06:16 PM
Source:[Ambito](https://www.ambito.com/informacion-general/marzo-traera-dos-eclipses-uno-visible-la-argentina-n6120106)

**Asean News Headlines at 10pm on Wednesday (March 5, 2025)**
The Asean region saw a variety of news headlines on March 5, 2025. In Malaysia, the police are investigating the death of a man found with bound legs and neck at the Treasury office, with no signs of foul play so far. Meanwhile, Saifuddin has asked the public to give the police space to investigate the officer's death at the Finance Ministry. In other news, Harith Iskandar and Cecelia Yap were fined RM10,000 each for posting offensive content on Facebook. The Negri Sembilan government has seen a surge in scams, with RM21.2mil lost in two months. The Parliamentary Services Bill has been hailed as a 'historic reform' by backbenchers, while the MBS was right to remove tenants' doors for rent arrears, according to the Negri MB. The parliament has passed a Bill to separate parliamentary service from civil service. In other regional news, Indonesia faces a risk of mass layoffs as textile giants prepare to relocate workers from Vietnam. The country is also debating a bigger role for the military under Prabowo. In Thailand, a Thai airline has halted some domestic flights to a backpacker hub due to air pollution. The country has also arrested 100 people for operating in a border scam centre. The Thai government has also announced a 'Homes for Thais' lottery starting in April. In the Philippines, the Air Force has grounded 11 FA-50PH jets after wreckage was found. Two pilots were found dead inside a FA-50 fighter jet in northern Mindanao. China monitored a Philippine supply run to a grounded warship on a disputed shoal. The Philippine inflation slowed more than expected in February as rice prices dropped. In Vietnam, coral reefs face collapse, but conservation efforts are underway. The country is also holding a dialogue with businesses from Asean, urging cooperation to achieve eight per cent GDP growth. In other news, Putin and the Myanmar junta chief are set to deepen military and economic ties. Kenyan scam centre victims are stuck in Myanmar. Aid group says 4,000 displaced by battle for a key Myanmar port site. In Cambodia, a regional flyway workshop aims to improve migratory bird conservation. Two international airlines will extend their wings to Cambodia this year. In Laos, pig farms are on alert after an African swine fever outbreak. The country is also moving to develop carbon markets in the energy sector. Indonesian workers were jailed for theft and money laundering in Brunei. Brunei's minister highlighted cybersecurity achievements. In Taiwan, a 75-year-old patient died after a dietary blunder in a Hong Kong hospital. North Korea has halted tours to a border city near China. In Malaysia, fuel prices dropped by 5 sen in Peninsular Malaysia. The country is now in its second semiconductor wave, according to Anwar. In Indonesia, the central bank lost its head as Adrian Orr suddenly resigned. The country leads gains in Asian stocks and currencies amid Trump tariff worries. In Bangladesh, a Rohingya leader was hacked to death. A US citizen was fined for unlawful possession of a bullet. In Hong Kong, fans were ordered out mid-match at a World Snooker event. A landmark theatre is closing down. In India, the country is charging 70% auto tariffs, with some claiming Trump's 100% claim is wrong.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 05, 2025 03:25 PM
Source:[The Star ](https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2025/03/05/asean-news-headlines-at-10pm-on-wednesday-march-5-2025)

**Delhi, Chennai and Mumbai to Host South African Tourism Roadshow Aimed at 16% Growth in Indian Arrivals by 2025: New Updates You Need to Know - Travel And Tour World**
South African Tourism aims to increase Indian tourist arrivals by 16% in 2025, building on the successful recovery of 2024. The country will host its annual India roadshow from March 18 to 20, 2025, in Delhi, Chennai, and Mumbai, featuring over 40 exhibitors from South Africa, including nine small, medium, and micro enterprises (SMMEs). The roadshow will showcase new experiences and attractions, and South African Tourism has implemented initiatives to ease travel from India, including the Electronic Travel Authorisation (ETA) system and the Trusted Tour Operator Scheme (TTOS) portal. The country is also focusing on various consumer segments within India, targeting adventure seekers, luxury travelers, family vacationers, and M.I.C.E. (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) groups. In 2024, nearly 49.6% of Indian tourists traveled for M.I.C.E. or business purposes, with M.I.C.E. alone accounting for 20.2%. The focus on M.I.C.E. travelers will continue in 2025, as South Africa prepares to take on the G20 Presidency in 2025 and enhances its global tourism alliances and promotes sustainable travel. 'More & More' brand campaign will be leveraged to deepen South Africa's presence in the Indian market, ensuring it remains a top choice for Indian travelers in the years to come.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 05, 2025 01:27 PM
Source:[travelandtourworld.com](https://www.travelandtourworld.com/news/article/delhi-chennai-and-mumbai-to-host-south-african-tourism-roadshow-aimed-at-16-growth-in-indian-arrivals-by-2025-new-updates-you-need-to-know/)

**Total Lunar Eclipse of March 2025: A Rare Celestial Event**
A total lunar eclipse, the first in almost three years, will occur on March 13-14, 2025, and will be visible in most of the Western Hemisphere, including North and South America, and parts of Europe and Africa. The eclipse will be visible to the naked eye, but using telescopes or binoculars will provide a better viewing experience. During the total eclipse, the Moon will take on a characteristic reddish hue, known as a 'Blood Moon'. This coloration is caused by the refraction of sunlight through the Earth's atmosphere, similar to the way sunsets appear red on Earth. The last total lunar eclipse occurred in November 2022, and the next one will occur in March 2026. The best viewing conditions will be in areas with clear skies and low light pollution, such as rural areas in the United States and countries in South America like Argentina, Chile, and Brazil.
Original language: es
Publish date: March 05, 2025 10:17 AM
Source:[mdz](https://www.mdzol.com/sociedad/2025/3/5/la-luna-de-sangre-regresa-donde-cuando-ver-el-eclipse-total-de-marzo-1192182.html)

**African Women in Politics - A Decisive Summit for the Future of Women's Leadership**
The 2025 Summit on Women's Political Leadership in Africa, scheduled for March 8th, aims to promote women's representation in governance and decision-making positions across the continent. The event, organized by the African Governance Centre, will bring together influential figures, experts, and decision-makers to discuss challenges and identify effective solutions. Despite progress in some African nations, 'gender stereotypes', cultural barriers, and institutional support remain key challenges. The summit aims to provide recommendations for addressing these shortcomings and ensuring women's voices are heard in decision-making processes. By fostering dialogue and highlighting inspiring stories of women leaders, the summit intends to promote more inclusive governance that reflects the realities of the continent.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 05, 2025 08:25 AM
Source:[allAfrica](https://allafrica.com/stories/202503050099.html)

**Total Lunar Eclipse and Partial Solar Eclipse in March 2025**
Two celestial events, a total lunar eclipse and a partial solar eclipse, will occur in March 2025. On March 14, 2025, a total lunar eclipse will occur, where the Earth's shadow will cover about 118% of the Moon's surface. This eclipse will coincide with the crescent moon of Ramadan 1446 AH. The eclipse will be visible in Europe, a large part of Asia, a large part of Australia, a large part of Africa, North America, South America, the Pacific Ocean, the Atlantic Ocean, the North Pole, and Antarctica. The total lunar eclipse will last for about six hours and three minutes. A partial solar eclipse will occur on March 29, 2025, where the Moon's shadow will cover about 94% of the Sun's disk. This eclipse will be visible in Europe, North Asia, North Africa, a large part of North America, North South America, the Atlantic Ocean, and the North Pole. The partial solar eclipse will last for about three hours and 53 minutes. According to Dr. Ashraf Tadros, a professor of astronomy at the National Research Institute of Astronomy, the total lunar eclipse will be visible in North America, Mexico, Central America, and South America, while it will be visible as a penumbral eclipse in large parts of Africa. The professor added that the partial solar eclipse will be visible in Canada, Greenland, northern Europe, and northern Asia. These celestial events can be used to confirm the beginning and end of lunar and Islamic months.
Original language: ar
Publish date: March 05, 2025 03:03 AM
Source:[اليوم السابع](https://www.youm7.com/story/2025/3/5/%D8%AE%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%81-%D9%88%D9%83%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%81-%D9%81%D9%89-%D8%B4%D9%87%D8%B1-%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%AD%D8%AF-%D8%AE%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%81-%D9%83%D9%84%D9%89-%D9%84%D9%84%D9%82%D9%85%D8%B1-%D9%88%D9%83%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%81-%D8%AC%D8%B2%D8%A6%D9%89/6905459)

**Pentagon makes bombshell announcement after pilot saw 'egg-shaped UFO'**
The US Department of Defense has confirmed it is investigating a whistleblower's claim that he recovered an 'egg-shaped' UFO from the ocean. Jake Barber, a government contractor, claims to have flown helicopters on covert missions to gather alien technology. He described flying 150 feet above an 'egg-shaped' object devoid of any engine or thermal signatures, saying, 'I saw an egg, a white egg.' This is the latest report of UAPs (unidentified anomalous phenomena) that the Pentagon admits they're actively scrutinising - adding this case to 21 others. The All-domain Anomaly Resolution Office (AARO) received 757 cases of UAP encounters from US authorities, including 272 incidents which occurred prior to 2023 but had never been reported publicly. Investigative journalist Ross Coulthart pointed out that AOIMSG's new director, Dr. Jon T. Kosloski, has very limited power when it comes to revealing government secrets, and that the Pentagon has a history of not being forthcoming about UAPs.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 02, 2025 05:19 AM
Source:[Mirror](https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/pentagon-makes-bombshell-announcement-after-34769838)

**Russian Pilots Spot UFO During Flight from St. Petersburg to Chelyabinsk**
The pilots of a Russian Airbus A319 flight from St. Petersburg to Chelyabinsk reported seeing an unidentified flying object (UFO) in the sky on February 27. According to the Aviaincident Telegram channel, the incident occurred shortly after takeoff, and the pilots described the object as a spherical, gray-colored object. The safety of the flight was not affected. It is noted that the relevant authorities, including the air defense systems, were informed about the incident. This incident comes after a US Air Force veteran, Jake Barber, claimed to have transported an alien spacecraft in the shape of a large egg, and a former NASA astronaut, Leroy Chiao, shared a close call with two UFOs in 2023.
Original language: ru
Publish date: February 27, 2025 05:23 PM
Source:[Аргументы и факты](https://aif.ru/incidents/piloty-letevshego-iz-peterburga-samoleta-zafiksirovali-v-nebe-nlo)

**Russian Pilots Report UFO Sighting During Flight**
The pilots of a Russian airline flight from St. Petersburg to Chelyabinsk reported seeing an unidentified flying object (UFO) in the sky. According to Aviaincident, the incident occurred on February 27, shortly after takeoff. The UFO was described as a 'gray sphere'. Fortunately, the safety of the flight was not affected, and air defense forces were immediately notified. This incident comes after a passenger Boeing from an Israeli airline, flying from Tel Aviv to New York, issued a distress signal over France due to a passenger's deteriorating health. 'The safety of the flight was not affected,' said the source. 'The air defense forces were immediately notified.'
Original language: ru
Publish date: February 27, 2025 04:53 PM
Source:[Московский Комсомолец](https://www.mk.ru/incident/2025/02/27/piloty-samoleta-rossiyskoy-aviakompanii-uvideli-vo-vremya-poleta-nlo.html)

**Military pilot reports 'weird' encounter with UFO during secret mission**
A US Air Force pilot, identified as 'Troy 21,' reported a close encounter with a UFO while on a secret mission over California on September 17, 2024. The object, described as a 'dark grey cylindrical object' roughly the size of a football, passed within 10 feet of the pilot's aircraft wing. Former FBI agent Ben Hansen speculated that the object was travelling at Mach 2, eliminating any normal explanation, such as a drone. The incident has raised concerns for aircraft safety in controlled airspace. This encounter adds to the growing list of close UFO sightings that are fuelling public belief in alien visitors to Earth.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 23, 2025 11:12 AM
Source:[Mirror](https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/us-news/military-pilot-reports-weird-encounter-34724888)

**Leaked recording: US Air Force pilot reports UFO over California in 2024**
A US Air Force pilot reported a UFO sighting in September 2024 while flying a Beechcraft 350 in California. The pilot, identified as 'Troy 21,' described a football-sized, dark, cylindrical object passing underneath his wing. The incident was reported to the National UFO Reporting Center. Radar systems on the plane detected an object 60 miles away, but it is unclear if it was the same object. The UFO's speed exceeded Mach 2 within two minutes, which is not possible for most drones. This incident is one of several recent UFO sightings, including a temporary suspension of operations at the Gaziantep Airport in Turkey due to a reported UFO sighting.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 22, 2025 07:16 PM
Source:[India Today](https://www.indiatoday.in/world/shows/story/the-buzz-leaked-recording-us-air-force-pilot-reports-ufo-over-california-in-2024-glbs-2683725-2025-02-23)

**Augustin Senghor Officially Announces Candidacy for FIFA Council Seat**
Augustin Senghor, the president of the Senegalese Football Federation (FSF), has officially announced his candidacy for a seat on the FIFA Council. At 59 years old, Senghor aims to take on a new challenge in his career as a football administrator, contributing to the major decisions of world football. According to Senghor, 'I thought the time had come to offer my services, my skills, and my experience to the realization of the convergent vision of our two Leaders, Gianni Infantino, President of FIFA, and Dr. Patrice Motsepe, President of CAF, for a strong and future-oriented African football.' Senghor has over 15 years of experience leading Senegalese football, and has held influential positions within CAF and FIFA, including member of the CAF Executive Committee, president of the UFOA A zone, and first vice-president of CAF. He emphasizes his commitment and passion for developing African football in his letter to African federations, stating, 'I am therefore pleased to come explicitly and with humility to solicit the vote of your Federation and your support for my candidacy, convinced that I can bring a plus to our continent and its football in the FIFA Council, where the most important decisions for world football and, by ricochet, for African football are made.' Senghor will face his peers at the CAF Congress on March 12, 2025, to secure one of the African representative seats on the FIFA Council.
Original language: fr
Publish date: February 22, 2025 04:36 PM
Source:[africafootunited.com](https://africafootunited.com/fifa-augustin-senghor-officiellement-candidat-au-poste-de-conseiller/)

**US Air Force pilot reports close encounter with ‘football-sized’ UFO in leaked audio**
A U.S. Air Force pilot, identified as 'Troy 21,' reported a close encounter with a 'football-sized,' dark gray, cylindrical object while flying a Beechcraft 350 C over California on September 17, 2024. The object passed just 10 feet beneath his aircraft's wing at 20,000 feet in controlled airspace near Los Angeles. According to the leaked audio, Troy 21 radioed air traffic control, saying, 'This is going to sound weird, but I just had something pass underneath my wing. Maybe a football-sized object right under my wing.' The object was detected on the jet's air-to-air system and radar approximately 60 miles away, leading experts to question whether it was a conventional drone or aircraft. Ben Hansen, a former FBI agent, noted that the speed and altitude made a drone explanation unlikely, saying, 'It would have exceeded Mach 2 in two minutes.' The incident has sparked intrigue and speculation about unexplained aerial phenomena (UAP), with some drawing parallels to other reported UAP encounters by military personnel.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 22, 2025 02:08 PM
Source:[endtimeheadlines.org](https://endtimeheadlines.org/2025/02/us-air-force-pilot-reports-close-encounter-with-football-sized-ufo-in-leaked-audio/)

**Don’t Miss These Astrophotography Opportunities in March 2025**
March 2025 brings several astrophotography opportunities, including Mercury at its greatest eastern elongation on March 8, a full worm moon and total lunar eclipse on March 14, and a partial solar eclipse on March 29. The full moon will be visible from most parts of the world, while the total lunar eclipse will be visible from specific regions, including Eastern Africa, Eastern Europe, and parts of Russia and China. The partial solar eclipse will be visible from Europe, North Asia, North/West Africa, and parts of North and South America. Additionally, Venus will shine bright in the evening sky, and the Milky Way will be visible throughout the month, providing opportunities for astrophotography.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 17, 2025 12:22 PM
Source:[diyphotography.net](https://www.diyphotography.net/dont-miss-these-astrophotography-opportunities-in-march-2025/)

**Glowing Sphere Over Cape Town, South Africa On Jan 22, 2025, UAP UFO Sighting News.**
A glowing sphere was spotted over Cape Town, South Africa on January 22, 2025. The sighting was recorded by a girl who was excited to see the sphere move about. The witness, who claims to have had a similar experience in the past, believes that the sphere is a UFO and that it is curious about humans. The witness also claims that UFOs have emotions and fear humans because they are an unpredictable species. The witness is adamant that the sighting is 100% real and stakes their reputation on it.

Publish date: February 10, 2025 12:11 PM

**US Pilot Claims to be Part of Secret UFO Program**
A former US Air Force pilot, Jake Barber, has come forward with claims of being part of a secret program to study and retrieve UFOs. Barber alleges that he was involved in the evacuation of a crashed UFO to a secret base in Nevada, and that he has experienced strange symptoms, including hair loss and severe burns, which he believes are related to his exposure to the UFO. The US government has acknowledged the existence of a secret program to study UFOs, and a former CIA agent has confirmed that the program is still active. The FBI has also confirmed that it has a special unit dedicated to investigating UFO sightings. Barber's claims have been corroborated by other witnesses, including a former Navy pilot who claims to have seen a UFO while on a mission. The US government has been criticized for its handling of UFO sightings, with some accusing it of covering up the truth. A former NASA employee has come forward with claims that the agency has been aware of UFOs for decades, but has been silenced by the government. The issue of UFOs has sparked a heated debate, with some arguing that it is a national security issue, while others believe that it is a matter of public interest. The Russian Academy of Sciences has also been involved in the search for extraterrestrial life, with a giant radio telescope in Karachay-Cherkessia capable of detecting signals from millions of light-years away. Scientists are searching for exoplanets similar to Earth, and have discovered 18 potential candidates. The search for extraterrestrial life is an ongoing effort, with scientists using a variety of methods to search for signs of life, including the detection of biosignatures in the atmospheres of exoplanets. While there is currently no conclusive evidence of extraterrestrial life, scientists remain hopeful that one day they will find evidence of life beyond Earth.

**CAF Announces New Format for CAN U17 2025, Tunisia and Algeria Reprieved**
The Confederation of African Football (CAF) has announced a new format for the 2025 U17 African Cup of Nations (CAN U17 2025) to be held in Morocco from March 30 to April 19. The number of participating teams will increase from 12 to 16. This change will benefit Tunisia, which finished third in the qualifying tournament, just behind Morocco and Egypt. Tunisia will be joined by Algeria, which finished fourth in the UNAF tournament. The other teams that will participate are: UFOA A (Gambia, Senegal, and Mali), UFOA B (Nigeria, Côte d'Ivoire, and Burkina Faso), CECAFA (Somalia, Uganda, and Tanzania), and COSAFA (South Africa, Zambia, and Angola).
Original language: fr

**CAN 2025 U17: CAF Announces New Format, Tunisia and Algeria Reprieved**
The Confederation of African Football (CAF) has announced a new format for the 2025 U17 African Cup of Nations (CAN U17 2025) to be held in Morocco from March 30 to April 19. The number of participating teams will increase from 12 to 16. This change will benefit Tunisia, which finished third in the qualifying tournament, and Algeria, which finished fourth. **US Congressman Claims Existence of Underwater Extraterrestrial Object**
US Representative Tim Burchett claimed that there is an unidentified object moving underwater at hundreds of kilometers per hour, according to international media reports. He stated, 'Something is moving at hundreds of kilometers per hour underwater, as big as a football field.' Burchett, who has previously claimed that the US government is hiding evidence of extraterrestrial life, said that the information came from an admiral, whom he did not identify. He stated that the incident was documented and reassured the American public, saying, 'I'm not worried about getting hurt. I mean, with those capabilities, they would have grilled us a long time ago.' The Pentagon released a report in March 2024 stating that it had no evidence of UFOs and that many mysterious sightings were actually weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.
Original language: es
Publish date: January 26, 2025 10:22 AM
Source:[lacapitalmdp.com](https://www.lacapitalmdp.com/estados-unidos-congresista-republicano-afirma-que-existe-una-nave-submarina-extraterrestre/)

**US Representative Claims Navy Admiral Told Him of Extraterrestrial Ships Moving Underwater**
US Representative Tim Burchett recently mentioned in an interview that a Navy Admiral told him that there are extraterrestrial ships moving underwater at incredible speeds. Although the UFO topic has been ridiculed in the past, the US Congress has been increasingly taking reports of mysterious unidentified flying objects seriously. According to a report by Agence France-Presse, Representative Burchett told former Republican Representative Matt Gaetz, who hosts a show on the right-wing media outlet One America News Network, 'They told me that there's something underwater moving at hundreds of miles per hour... it's as big as an American football field.' Burchett emphasized that this incident is documented and was told to him by a Navy Admiral, but he did not reveal the Admiral's identity. Burchett is known for claiming that the US government is hiding UFO and extraterrestrial activity, and he believes that anything is possible in the vast universe. Currently, there is no evidence to suggest that intelligent life exists outside of Earth. Despite this, the US Congress is increasingly taking reports of mysterious flying objects seriously, turning the once-mocked UFO topic into a serious issue. The US Department of Defense released a report in March 2024 stating that it found no evidence of UFOs and that many reported sightings were actually of weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.
Original language: zh
Publish date: January 25, 2025 02:06 AM
Source:[ETtoday新聞雲](https://www.ettoday.net/news/20250125/2899057.htm)

**'Smooth, Shiny' Spheres 'Came Right At' NASA Astronaut Flying Over Texas**
NASA astronaut Leroy Chiao reported seeing two 'smooth' and 'shiny' orbs flying above Houston, Texas while flying his private plane at 9,000 feet in 2023. The orbs, each around three feet in diameter, sped by him around 20 feet away from his plane and had 'no visible means of propulsion.' Chiao, a highly accomplished pilot and space traveler, claimed that the orbs 'came right at me' and that he was at a loss for any explanation. He attributed the technology to the American military, saying 'what the hell are they doing flying it where airplanes are operating?' This sighting aligns with declassified Pentagon footage of a UFO flying over a military base in the Middle East in April 2023.
Original language: en
Publish date: January 07, 2025 05:09 PM
Source:[Jalopnik](https://jalopnik.com/smooth-shiny-spheres-came-right-at-nasa-astronaut-1851734089)

summary: After considering historical data and recent developments, the experts revised their probabilities for a pilot report of UFOs from a country in Africa in March 2025. Most experts started with a low initial probability, typically around 5-10%, due to historically infrequent reports from Africa compared to other regions. Factors such as increased global awareness of UFOs and improvements in reporting infrastructure were seen as potentially increasing the likelihood. However, cultural stigma and infrastructural challenges were noted as significant barriers to reporting. In the second phase, despite increased global discourse on UFOs, there was no specific evidence of increased pilot reports from Africa. Revised probabilities varied, with most experts slightly raising their estimates to 10-25%, while a few maintained a lower likelihood closer to their initial estimates. Overall, the consensus suggested a moderate increase in probability, yet still acknowledging considerable challenges for such reports from Africa.
